name: Wordpress
natural_language_description: 这是 Wordpress 节点。主要用于: Consume Wordpress API

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: post
available_options: Post (值: post)
Page (值: page)
User (值: user)
Custom API Call (值: __CUSTOM_API_CALL__)

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: create
available_options: Create (值: create) - Create a user
Get (值: get) - Get a user
Get Many (值: getAll) - Get many users
Update (值: update) - Update a user
Custom API Call (值: __CUSTOM_API_CALL__)

title.name: title
title.natural_language_description: 参数名: Title | 作用: The title for the page | (必填项)

additionalFields.name: additionalFields
additionalFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Additional Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: url (值: None) - URL of the user
description (值: None) - Description of the user
nickname (值: None) - The nickname for the user
slug (值: None) - An alphanumeric identifier for the user

postId.name: postId
postId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Post ID | 作用: Unique identifier for the object | (必填项)

updateFields.name: updateFields
updateFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Update Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: username (值: None) - Login name for the user
name (值: None) - Display name for the user
firstName (值: None) - First name for the user
lastName (值: None) - Last name for the user
email (值: None) - The email address for the user
password (值: None) - Password for the user (never included)
url (值: None) - URL of the user
description (值: None) - Description of the user
nickname (值: None) - The nickname for the user
slug (值: None) - An alphanumeric identifier for the user

options.name: options
options.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: context (值: None) - Scope under which the request is made; determines fields present in response
orderBy (值: None) - Sort collection by object attribute
order (值: None) - Order sort attribute ascending or descending
search (值: None) - Limit results to those matching a string
who (值: None) - Limit result set to users who are considered authors

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit
returnAll.natural_language_description: 参数名: Return All | 作用: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit | 默认值: False

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.natural_language_description: 参数名: Limit | 作用: Max number of results to return | 默认值: 5

pageId.name: pageId
pageId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Page ID | 作用: Unique identifier for the object | (必填项)

username.name: username
username.natural_language_description: 参数名: Username | 作用: Login name for the user | (必填项)

name.name: name
name.natural_language_description: 参数名: Name | 作用: Display name for the user | (必填项)

firstName.name: firstName
firstName.natural_language_description: 参数名: First Name | 作用: First name for the user | (必填项)

lastName.name: lastName
lastName.natural_language_description: 参数名: Last Name | 作用: Last name for the user | (必填项)

email.name: email
email.description: The email address for the user
email.natural_language_description: 参数名: Email | 作用: The email address for the user | (必填项)

password.name: password
password.natural_language_description: 参数名: Password | 作用: Password for the user (never included) | (必填项)

userId.name: userId
userId.natural_language_description: 参数名: User ID | 作用: Unique identifier for the user | (必填项)

reassign.name: reassign
reassign.description: Reassign the deleted user's posts and links to this user ID
reassign.natural_language_description: 参数名: Reassign | 作用: Reassign the deleted user's posts and links to this user ID | (必填项)
